page.title: 01TEANASSIE AREA
page.content: Highland Region,Scotland.Beauly 5mls,Inverness 15mls,Dingwall 15mls,Cannich 13mls.This is an upland area of heather,hills and moorlands and scattered crofting townships. Large areas are covered with trees_mainly conifers, birch and alder.The River Beauly runs through our square.It is famous for salmon fishing.A Hydro Electric Dam has been built on the river. In our square there is one of the few deer farms in Scotland.It has over 700 deer and venison is sold directly to the public.Many tourists come here in the summer because there are chalet parks, open spaces for camping and interesting places for tourists to visit. Shinty is the main sport in our area.There are three senior shinty clubs in the villages round about.
